title: LAI-PrEP Bridge Period Decision Support Tool v2.1.1

description: Clinical decision support for LAI-PrEP bridge period navigation validated at UNAIDS global target scale (21.2M patients). This release provides algorithmic refinements, explainable JSON output, command-line tools, comprehensive validation across synthetic populations, and implementation-ready clinical guides.
